title: Slicebox
description: Slicebox - safe sharing of medical images

post_anonymization_anonymize.title: anonymize the images corresponding to the supplied list of image IDs (each paired with a list of DICOM tag translation). This route corresponds to repeated use of the route /images/{id}/anonymize.
post_anonymization_anonymize.description: anonymize the images corresponding to the supplied list of image IDs (each paired with a list of DICOM tag translation). This route corresponds to repeated use of the route /images/{id}/anonymize.

get_anonymization_keys.title: get a list of anonymization keys, each specifying how vital DICOM attributes have been anonymized for a particular image
get_anonymization_keys.description: get a list of anonymization keys, each specifying how vital DICOM attributes have been anonymized for a particular image

get_anonymization_keys_export_csv.title: export all anonymization keys as a csv file
get_anonymization_keys_export_csv.description: export all anonymization keys as a csv file

post_anonymization_keys_query.title: submit a query for anonymization keys
post_anonymization_keys_query.description: submit a query for anonymization keys

delete_anonymization_keys__id_.title: delete an anonymization key that is no longer of interest
delete_anonymization_keys__id_.description: delete an anonymization key that is no longer of interest

get_anonymization_keys__id_.title: get the anonymization key with the supplied ID
get_anonymization_keys__id_.description: get the anonymization key with the supplied ID

get_anonymization_keys__id__keyvalues.title: get pointers to the images corresponding to the anonymization key with the supplied ID
get_anonymization_keys__id__keyvalues.description: get pointers to the images corresponding to the anonymization key with the supplied ID

get_anonymization_options.title: list all supported anonymization options defining an anonymization profile
get_anonymization_options.description: list all supported anonymization options defining an anonymization profile

get_boxes.title: get a list of box connections
get_boxes.description: get a list of box connections

post_boxes_connect.title: connect to another box using a received URL. Used to connect to a public box.
post_boxes_connect.description: connect to another box using a received URL. Used to connect to a public box.

post_boxes_createconnection.title: create a new box connection where the supplied entity holds the remote box name. Used by publicly available boxes.
post_boxes_createconnection.description: create a new box connection where the supplied entity holds the remote box name. Used by publicly available boxes.

get_boxes_incoming.title: get incoming transactions (finished, currently receiving, waiting or failed)
get_boxes_incoming.description: get incoming transactions (finished, currently receiving, waiting or failed)

delete_boxes_incoming__id_.title: delete an incoming transaction. If a currently active transaction is deleted, a new transaction with the remainder of the images is created when receiving the next incoming image.
delete_boxes_incoming__id_.description: delete an incoming transaction. If a currently active transaction is deleted, a new transaction with the remainder of the images is created when receiving the next incoming image.

get_boxes_incoming__id__images.title: get the received images corresponding to the incoming transaction with the supplied ID
get_boxes_incoming__id__images.description: get the received images corresponding to the incoming transaction with the supplied ID

get_boxes_outgoing.title: get outgoing transactions (finished, currently sending, waiting or failed)
get_boxes_outgoing.description: get outgoing transactions (finished, currently sending, waiting or failed)

delete_boxes_outgoing__id_.title: delete an outgoing transaction. This will stop ongoing transactions.
delete_boxes_outgoing__id_.description: delete an outgoing transaction. This will stop ongoing transactions.

get_boxes_outgoing__id__images.title: get the sent images corresponding to the outgoing transaction with the supplied ID
get_boxes_outgoing__id__images.description: get the sent images corresponding to the outgoing transaction with the supplied ID

delete_boxes__id_.title: Delete the remote box with the supplied ID
delete_boxes__id_.description: Delete the remote box with the supplied ID

post_boxes__id__send.title: send images corresponding to the supplied image ids to the remote box with the supplied ID
post_boxes__id__send.description: send images corresponding to the supplied image ids to the remote box with the supplied ID

get_destinations.title: Returns a list of currently available destinations. Possible destinations are box - sending data to a remote box, and scu - sending data a receiving SCP.
get_destinations.description: Returns a list of currently available destinations. Possible destinations are box - sending data to a remote box, and scu - sending data a receiving SCP.

get_directorywatches.title: get a list of watch directories. Each watch directory and its sub-directories are watched for incoming DICOM files, which are read and imported into slicebox.
get_directorywatches.description: get a list of watch directories. Each watch directory and its sub-directories are watched for incoming DICOM files, which are read and imported into slicebox.

post_directorywatches.title: add a new directory to watch for incoming DICOM files
post_directorywatches.description: add a new directory to watch for incoming DICOM files

delete_directorywatches__id_.title: stop watching and remove the directory corresponding to the supplied ID
delete_directorywatches__id_.description: stop watching and remove the directory corresponding to the supplied ID

get_filtering_associations.title: Get a list of source to filter associations.
get_filtering_associations.description: Get a list of source to filter associations.

post_filtering_associations.title: Inserts or updates a source <-> filter associations. If the specified Source already  has an association this is updated, otherwise a new is inserted.
post_filtering_associations.description: Inserts or updates a source <-> filter associations. If the specified Source already  has an association this is updated, otherwise a new is inserted.

delete_filtering_associations__id_.title: remove the source <-> filter association corresponding to the supplied ID
delete_filtering_associations__id_.description: remove the source <-> filter association corresponding to the supplied ID

post_filtering_filters.title: Inserts or updates a filter. If a filter with same name as supplied filter exists this filter is updated, otherwise a new filter is inserted.
post_filtering_filters.description: Inserts or updates a filter. If a filter with same name as supplied filter exists this filter is updated, otherwise a new filter is inserted.

delete_filtering_filters__id_.title: remove the filter corresponding to the supplied ID
delete_filtering_filters__id_.description: remove the filter corresponding to the supplied ID

get_filtering_filters__id__tagpaths.title: List tagpaths for the selected filter
get_filtering_filters__id__tagpaths.description: List tagpaths for the selected filter

post_filtering_filters__id__tagpaths.title: add a tagpath to a filter
post_filtering_filters__id__tagpaths.description: add a tagpath to a filter

delete_filtering_filters__id__tagpaths__.title: remove the tagpath corresponding to the supplied ID
delete_filtering_filters__id__tagpaths__.description: remove the tagpath corresponding to the supplied ID

delete_forwarding_rule__id_.title: remove the forwarding rule corresponding to the supplied ID
delete_forwarding_rule__id_.description: remove the forwarding rule corresponding to the supplied ID

get_forwarding_rules.title: get a list of all forwarding rules. A forwarding rule specifies the automatic forwarding of images from a source (SCP, BOX, etc.) to a destimation (BOX, SCU, etc.)
get_forwarding_rules.description: get a list of all forwarding rules. A forwarding rule specifies the automatic forwarding of images from a source (SCP, BOX, etc.) to a destimation (BOX, SCU, etc.)

post_images.title: add a DICOM dataset to slicebox
post_images.description: add a DICOM dataset to slicebox

post_images_delete.title: bulk delete a sequence of images according to the supplied image IDs. This is the same as a sequence of DELETE requests to /images/{id}
post_images_delete.description: bulk delete a sequence of images according to the supplied image IDs. This is the same as a sequence of DELETE requests to /images/{id}

get_images_export.title: download the export set with the supplied export set ID as a zip archive
get_images_export.description: download the export set with the supplied export set ID as a zip archive

post_images_export.title: create an export set, a group of image IDs of images to export. The export set will contain the selected images. The export set is available for download 12 hours before it is automatically deleted.
post_images_export.description: create an export set, a group of image IDs of images to export. The export set will contain the selected images. The export set is available for download 12 hours before it is automatically deleted.

post_images_jpeg.title: add a JPEG image to slicebox. The image data will be wrapped in a DICOM file and added as a new series belonging to the study with the supplied ID
post_images_jpeg.description: add a JPEG image to slicebox. The image data will be wrapped in a DICOM file and added as a new series belonging to the study with the supplied ID

delete_images__id_.title: Delete the image with the supplied ID
delete_images__id_.description: Delete the image with the supplied ID

get_images__id_.title: fetch dataset corresponding to the supplied image ID
get_images__id_.description: fetch dataset corresponding to the supplied image ID

put_images__id__anonymize.title: delete the selected image and replace it with an anonymized version
put_images__id__anonymize.description: delete the selected image and replace it with an anonymized version

post_images__id__anonymized.title: get an anonymized version of the image with the supplied ID
post_images__id__anonymized.description: get an anonymized version of the image with the supplied ID

get_images__id__attributes.title: list all DICOM attributes of the dataset corresponding to the supplied image ID
get_images__id__attributes.description: list all DICOM attributes of the dataset corresponding to the supplied image ID

get_images__id__imageinformation.title: get basic information about the pixel data of an image
get_images__id__imageinformation.description: get basic information about the pixel data of an image

put_images__id__modify.title: modify and/or insert image attributes according to the input tagpath-value mappings
put_images__id__modify.description: modify and/or insert image attributes according to the input tagpath-value mappings

get_images__id__png.title: get a PNG image representation of the image corresponding to the supplied ID
get_images__id__png.description: get a PNG image representation of the image corresponding to the supplied ID

get_import_sessions.title: Returns a list of available import sessions.
get_import_sessions.description: Returns a list of available import sessions.

delete_import_sessions__id_.title: deletes the import session with the supplied ID
delete_import_sessions__id_.description: deletes the import session with the supplied ID

get_import_sessions__id_.title: Returns the import sessions with the supplied ID
get_import_sessions__id_.description: Returns the import sessions with the supplied ID

get_import_sessions__id__images.title: get the imported images corresponding to the import session with the supplied ID
get_import_sessions__id__images.description: get the imported images corresponding to the import session with the supplied ID

post_import_sessions__id__images.title: add a DICOM dataset to the import session with the supplied ID
post_import_sessions__id__images.description: add a DICOM dataset to the import session with the supplied ID

get_log.title: get a list of slicebox log messages
get_log.description: get a list of slicebox log messages

delete_log__id_.title: Delete the log entry with the supplied ID
delete_log__id_.description: Delete the log entry with the supplied ID

get_metadata_flatseries.title: Returns a list of flattened metadata on the patient, study and series levels
get_metadata_flatseries.description: Returns a list of flattened metadata on the patient, study and series levels

post_metadata_flatseries_query.title: submit a query for flat series
post_metadata_flatseries_query.description: submit a query for flat series

get_metadata_flatseries__id_.title: Return the flat series with the supplied ID
get_metadata_flatseries__id_.description: Return the flat series with the supplied ID

get_metadata_images.title: Returns a list of metadata on the image level of the DICOM hierarchy
get_metadata_images.description: Returns a list of metadata on the image level of the DICOM hierarchy

get_metadata_images__id_.title: Return the image with the supplied ID
get_metadata_images__id_.description: Return the image with the supplied ID

get_metadata_patients.title: Returns a list of metadata on the patient level of the DICOM hierarchy
get_metadata_patients.description: Returns a list of metadata on the patient level of the DICOM hierarchy

get_metadata_patients__id_.title: Return the patient with the supplied ID
get_metadata_patients__id_.description: Return the patient with the supplied ID

get_metadata_patients__id__images.title: Returns all images for the patient with the supplied patient ID
get_metadata_patients__id__images.description: Returns all images for the patient with the supplied patient ID

get_metadata_series.title: Returns a list of metadata on the series level of the DICOM hierarchy
get_metadata_series.description: Returns a list of metadata on the series level of the DICOM hierarchy

get_metadata_series__id_.title: Return the series with the supplied ID
get_metadata_series__id_.description: Return the series with the supplied ID

get_metadata_series__id__seriestags.title: get the list of series tags for the series with the supplied ID.
get_metadata_series__id__seriestags.description: get the list of series tags for the series with the supplied ID.

post_metadata_series__id__seriestags.title: add a series tag to the series with the supplied ID
post_metadata_series__id__seriestags.description: add a series tag to the series with the supplied ID

delete_metadata_series__id__seriestypes.title: Delete all series types for the series with the supplied ID
delete_metadata_series__id__seriestypes.description: Delete all series types for the series with the supplied ID

get_metadata_series__id__seriestypes.title: get the list of series types for the series with the supplied ID.
get_metadata_series__id__seriestypes.description: get the list of series types for the series with the supplied ID.

get_metadata_series__id__source.title: Return the source of the series with the supplied ID
get_metadata_series__id__source.description: Return the source of the series with the supplied ID

delete_metadata_series__seriesId__series.title: Delete the series tag with the supplied series tag ID from the series with the supplied series ID
delete_metadata_series__seriesId__series.description: Delete the series tag with the supplied series tag ID from the series with the supplied series ID

delete_metadata_series__seriesId__series.title: Delete the series type with the supplied series type ID from the series with the supplied series ID
delete_metadata_series__seriesId__series.description: Delete the series type with the supplied series type ID from the series with the supplied series ID

put_metadata_series__seriesId__seriestyp.title: Add the series type with the supplied series type ID to the series with the supplied series ID
put_metadata_series__seriesId__seriestyp.description: Add the series type with the supplied series type ID to the series with the supplied series ID

get_metadata_seriestags.title: Returns a list of series tags currently currently in use.
get_metadata_seriestags.description: Returns a list of series tags currently currently in use.

get_metadata_studies.title: Returns a list of metadata on the study level of the DICOM hierarchy
get_metadata_studies.description: Returns a list of metadata on the study level of the DICOM hierarchy

get_metadata_studies__id_.title: Return the study with the supplied ID
get_metadata_studies__id_.description: Return the study with the supplied ID

get_metadata_studies__id__images.title: Returns all images for the study with the supplied study ID
get_metadata_studies__id__images.description: Returns all images for the study with the supplied study ID

get_scps.title: get a list of DICOM SCPs. Each SCP is a server for receiving DICOM images from e.g. a PACS system.
get_scps.description: get a list of DICOM SCPs. Each SCP is a server for receiving DICOM images from e.g. a PACS system.

post_scps.title: add a new SCP for receiving DICOM images
post_scps.description: add a new SCP for receiving DICOM images

delete_scps__id_.title: shut down and remove the SCP corresponding to the supplied ID
delete_scps__id_.description: shut down and remove the SCP corresponding to the supplied ID

get_scus.title: get a list of DICOM SCUs. Each SCU is a client for sending DICOM images to an SCP, e.g. a PACS system.
get_scus.description: get a list of DICOM SCUs. Each SCU is a client for sending DICOM images to an SCP, e.g. a PACS system.

post_scus.title: add a new SCU for sending DICOM images
post_scus.description: add a new SCU for sending DICOM images

delete_scus__id_.title: remove the SCU corresponding to the supplied ID
delete_scus__id_.description: remove the SCU corresponding to the supplied ID

post_scus__id__send.title: send the images with the supplied image IDs to a DICOM SCP using the the SCU with the supplied scu ID
post_scus__id__send.description: send the images with the supplied image IDs to a DICOM SCP using the the SCU with the supplied scu ID

get_seriestypes.title: get a list of all added series types. By filtering search results for certain series types, it is easier for applications to ensure that they read images of applicable types.
get_seriestypes.description: get a list of all added series types. By filtering search results for certain series types, it is easier for applications to ensure that they read images of applicable types.

get_seriestypes_rules.title: get a list of rules for assigning series types to series. A rule connects to a series of attributes with values and a resulting series type. If a series has the required values of the listed attributes, it is assigned to the series type of the rule.
get_seriestypes_rules.description: get a list of rules for assigning series types to series. A rule connects to a series of attributes with values and a resulting series type. If a series has the required values of the listed attributes, it is assigned to the series type of the rule.

post_seriestypes_rules.title: add a new series type rule
post_seriestypes_rules.description: add a new series type rule

get_seriestypes_rules_updatestatus.title: get the status of the internal process of updating series types for series following a change of series types, rules or attributes.
get_seriestypes_rules_updatestatus.description: get the status of the internal process of updating series types for series following a change of series types, rules or attributes.

delete_seriestypes_rules__id_.title: remove the series type rule corresponding to the supplied ID
delete_seriestypes_rules__id_.description: remove the series type rule corresponding to the supplied ID

get_seriestypes_rules__id__attributes.title: get the list of attributes for the series type rule with the supplied ID.
get_seriestypes_rules__id__attributes.description: get the list of attributes for the series type rule with the supplied ID.

post_seriestypes_rules__id__attributes.title: add a new series type rule attribute
post_seriestypes_rules__id__attributes.description: add a new series type rule attribute

delete_seriestypes_rules__ruleId__attrib.title: remove the series type rule attribute corresponding to the supplied series type and attribute IDs
delete_seriestypes_rules__ruleId__attrib.description: remove the series type rule attribute corresponding to the supplied series type and attribute IDs

post_seriestypes_series_query.title: submit a query for seriestypes for a list of series
post_seriestypes_series_query.description: submit a query for seriestypes for a list of series

delete_seriestypes__id_.title: remove the series type corresponding to the supplied ID
delete_seriestypes__id_.description: remove the series type corresponding to the supplied ID

put_seriestypes__id_.title: request an asynchronous update of all series, labelling appropriate series with the series type corresponding to the supplied ID.
put_seriestypes__id_.description: request an asynchronous update of all series, labelling appropriate series with the series type corresponding to the supplied ID.

get_sources.title: Returns a list of currently available data sources. Possible source types are user - data imported by an API call by a user, box - data received from a remote box, directory - data imported via a watched directory, import - data imported into slicebox using import sessions, or scp - data received from a PACS.
get_sources.description: Returns a list of currently available data sources. Possible source types are user - data imported by an API call by a user, box - data received from a remote box, directory - data imported via a watched directory, import - data imported into slicebox using import sessions, or scp - data received from a PACS.

get_system_health.title: No-op route for checking whether the service is alive or not
get_system_health.description: No-op route for checking whether the service is alive or not

post_transactions__token__image.title: add an image (dataset) as part of a transaction. This method is used when sending images using the push method to a public slicebox.
post_transactions__token__image.description: add an image (dataset) as part of a transaction. This method is used when sending images using the push method to a public slicebox.

get_transactions__token__outgoing.title: fetch an image from the connected box as part of a transaction. This method is used when sending images using the poll method from a public slicebox.
get_transactions__token__outgoing.description: fetch an image from the connected box as part of a transaction. This method is used when sending images using the poll method from a public slicebox.

post_transactions__token__outgoing_done.title: signal that the supplied outgoing transaction and image was successfully received and can be marked as sent. This method is used when sending images using the poll method from a public slicebox.
post_transactions__token__outgoing_done.description: signal that the supplied outgoing transaction and image was successfully received and can be marked as sent. This method is used when sending images using the poll method from a public slicebox.

post_transactions__token__outgoing_faile.title: signal that the image corresponding to the supplied outgoing transaction and image could not be read or stored properly on the receiving side, and that the transaction should be marked as failed.
post_transactions__token__outgoing_faile.description: signal that the image corresponding to the supplied outgoing transaction and image could not be read or stored properly on the receiving side, and that the transaction should be marked as failed.

get_transactions__token__outgoing_poll.title: get next outgoing transaction and image (information on the next image that the connected box wishes to send to you), if any. This method is used when sending images using the poll method from a public slicebox.
get_transactions__token__outgoing_poll.description: get next outgoing transaction and image (information on the next image that the connected box wishes to send to you), if any. This method is used when sending images using the poll method from a public slicebox.

get_transactions__token__status.title: get the status of the remote incoming transaction with the supplied transaction ID
get_transactions__token__status.description: get the status of the remote incoming transaction with the supplied transaction ID

put_transactions__token__status.title: update the status of the transaction with the supplied ID
put_transactions__token__status.description: update the status of the transaction with the supplied ID

post_users.title: Creates a new user. Dupicates are accepted but not added.
post_users.description: Creates a new user. Dupicates are accepted but not added.

get_users_current.title: obtain information on the currently logged in user as specified by the supplied session cookie, IP address and user agent.
get_users_current.description: obtain information on the currently logged in user as specified by the supplied session cookie, IP address and user agent.

post_users_login.title: Obtain a session cookie that can be used to authenticate future API calls from the present IP address and with the present user agent.
post_users_login.description: Obtain a session cookie that can be used to authenticate future API calls from the present IP address and with the present user agent.

post_users_logout.title: Logout the current user by responding with a delete cookie header removing the session cookie for this user.
post_users_logout.description: Logout the current user by responding with a delete cookie header removing the session cookie for this user.

delete_users__id_.title: deletes a single user based on the ID supplied
delete_users__id_.description: deletes a single user based on the ID supplied
